mapper.select: SELECT order_id, order_pattern, store_brand_code, shop_code, cust_cd, cust_nm, total_price, cash_discount_price, cash_product_price, maker_factory_status, tsc_status, cash_id, store_staff_nm, cust_staff, product_orderd_date, version, cash_contail_tax_product_price FROM dtb_order WHERE order_id = #{orderId} ORDER by order_id
mapper.update: UPDATE dtb_order SET cash_id = #{cashId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_discount_price = #{cashDiscountPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_product_price = #{cashProductPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_contail_tax_product_price = #{cashContailTaxProductPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_user_id = #{updatedUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=SMALLINT} + 1, tsc_status = #{tscStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and version = #{version,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: SELECT ord.order_id, ord.order_pattern, ord.store_brand_code, ord.shop_code, ord.cust_cd, ord.cust_nm, ord.total_price, ord.cash_discount_price, ord.cash_product_price, ord.maker_factory_status, ord.tsc_status, ord.cash_id, ord.store_staff_nm, ord.is_cancelled, ord.cust_staff, ord.product_orderd_date, ord.cash_contail_tax_product_price, ord.version FROM dtb_order ord, dtb_cash cash WHERE cash.cash_id = #{cashId} AND ord.cash_id = cash.cash_id ORDER by ord.order_id
